verbose_text: The Th2 cytokines such as IL-4 and IL-13 bind to IL-4 and IL-13 receptors to induce the formation of M2a macrophages, whereas M2b macrophages are induced by immunoglobulin complexes in combination with TLR agonists, and M2c macrophages are induced by IL-10, transforming growth factor beta (TGF-beta), or glucocorticoids.
evidence: induced by IL-10, transforming growth factor beta (TGF-beta
